# SCUM Admin Helper Linux Scripts

This workspace contains bash scripts for managing SCUM Admin Helper on Linux systems.

## Project Structure
- `scripts/` - Main executable scripts
- `docs/` - Documentation and guides
- `examples/` - Configuration examples

## Guidelines
- All scripts are bash-based for Linux compatibility
- Scripts handle Proton/Wine integration for Windows-only SAH application
- Focus on automation and user-friendly installation
